abstract: St. Martin’s Press will publish a memoir by Chrisann Brennan, Steve Jobs’s high school girlfriend and the mother of his daughter Lisa, that will cover their relationship, the founding of Apple and Jobs’s “ambition and ruthlessness” in business.
snippet: St. Martin’s Press will publish a memoir by Chrisann Brennan, Steve Jobs’s high school girlfriend and the mother of his daughter Lisa, that will cover their relationship, the founding of Apple and Jobs’s “ambition and ruthlessness” in business.
lead_paragraph: Chrisann Brennan was one of Steve Jobs’s first serious loves, his high school girlfriend and the mother of his daughter Lisa. Now Ms. Brennan will tell the story of her relationship with Mr. Jobs, the Apple co-founder who died in 2011, in a new memoir to be published next year. St. Martin’s Press, part of Macmillan, said on Thursday it had acquired the rights to an untitled memoir by Ms. Brennan, who is now a painter based in the San Francisco Bay Area.

headline.main: Steve Jobs’s High School Girlfriend to Publish Memoir
